title: HC grants EIH time to reply in Wildflower Hall dispute
description: The Himachal Pradesh High Court granted EIH Ltd, the flagship company of the Oberoi Group, time to file its rejoinder to the reply filed by the state government in a dispute over the historic Wildflower Hall luxury hotel in Shimla.
